events.message: I just received my new headphones, but there is a noticeable scratch on the left ear cup and the sound quality is off.
The issue has been categorized as a Product Defect due to reported damage and sound issues.
A customer care agent has been assigned to handle the defective headphone case.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your headphones. I’m here to help you get this resolved.
Could you please provide photos of the scratch and confirm if the headphones were tested on multiple devices?
I’ve attached the photos showing the scratch clearly. Yes, I tried the headphones on my laptop and phone, and the sound still sounds distorted.
Thank you for the information. We can offer you a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement if the new one has no defects. Please proceed with that option.
A replacement headphone unit has been arranged for shipment, and you will receive the tracking details shortly.
Just checking in to ensure your replacement headphones arrived in good condition and are working properly.
Yes, I received the replacement yesterday and it looks perfect with great sound quality. Thank you for the speedy help!
We are glad everything is resolved. Your case has been closed. Thank you for contacting support.
